questions.question: Does the new implementation maintain backward compatibility with existing callers?
questions.why: Ensures no breaking changes for dependent code

questions.question: Are all error cases properly handled with appropriate error messages?
questions.why: Prevents runtime errors and improves debugging

questions.question: Does the data transformation preserve all required fields?
questions.why: Ensures no data loss during processing

questions.question: Does the validator check all required input fields?
questions.why: Prevents invalid data from entering the system

questions.question: Are boundary conditions (null, empty, max values) handled correctly?
questions.why: Prevents unexpected behavior with edge case inputs

questions.question: Do tests cover success, failure, and edge case scenarios?
Do all assertions verify the expected behavior clearly?
questions.why: Makes test failures easy to diagnose
